ModMetaData.name: RimTest - Automated Testing Framework
ModMetaData.author: LaTrissTitude
ModMetaData.description:
Finally we have unit tests for RimWorld modding!
No more manual testing your mods on development, this mod automates the testing process by introducing a testing framework that allows you to test your mods in a simple and easy way. You can save your time and energy, let your computer do the testing for you.
